CommandAddSongRequest.label: Add Song Request Command
CommandAddSongRequest.tooltip: The command that will be used to add song requests.

CommandAddSongRequestCooldown.label: Add Song Request Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandAddSongRequestCooldown.tooltip: How long the Add Song Request command should go on cooldown for.

CommandCancelSongRequest.label: Cancel Song Request Command
CommandCancelSongRequest.tooltip: The command that will be used to cancel song requests.

CommandCancelSongRequestCooldown.label: Cancel Song Request Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandCancelSongRequestCooldown.tooltip: How long the Cancel Song Request command should go on cooldown for.

CommandApproveSongRequest.label: Approve Song Request Command
CommandApproveSongRequest.tooltip: The command that will be used to approve song requests from other users.

CommandApproveSongRequestCooldown.label: Approve Song Request Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandApproveSongRequestCooldown.tooltip: How long the Approve Song Request command should go on cooldown for.

CommandRejectSongRequest.label: Reject Song Request Command
CommandRejectSongRequest.tooltip: The command that will be used to reject song requests from other users.

CommandRejectSongRequestCooldown.label: Reject Song Request Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandRejectSongRequestCooldown.tooltip: How long the Reject Song Request command should go on cooldown for.

CommandGetSongRequest.label: Get Song Request Command
CommandGetSongRequest.tooltip: The command that will be used to get song requests from other users.

CommandGetSongRequestCooldown.label: Get Song Request Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandGetSongRequestCooldown.tooltip: How long the Get Song Request command should go on cooldown for.

HttpPageLinkToParse.label: HTTP page link to parse
HttpPageLinkToParse.tooltip: HTTP page of song request site with player. This page will be parsed and used in script logic.

MaxNumberOfSongRequestsToAdd.label: Maximum Number Of Song Requests
MaxNumberOfSongRequestsToAdd.tooltip: How many song requests users can add per stream.

UseWhisperMessagesToControlSongRequests.label: Use Whisper Messages To Control Song Requests
UseWhisperMessagesToControlSongRequests.tooltip: Allow bot to use whisper messages to control song requests. You can use this feature to decrease amount of messages in chat.

DispatchTimeoutInSeconds.label: Dispatch Timeout For Song Requests (In Seconds)
DispatchTimeoutInSeconds.tooltip: Dispatch timeout for song requests (in seconds).

TimeoutToWaitInMilliseconds.label: Timeout For Waiting Song Requests (In Milliseconds)
TimeoutToWaitInMilliseconds.tooltip: Timeout for waiting song requests processing (in milliseconds).

SelectedBrowserDriver.label: Browser Driver Type To Use
SelectedBrowserDriver.tooltip: Browser driver type which will be used to process song request commands.

BrowserDriverExecutableName.label: Browser Driver Executable Name
BrowserDriverExecutableName.tooltip: Browser driver executable name in driver path.

ElementIdOfNewSongTextField.label: Element ID Of New Song Text Field
ElementIdOfNewSongTextField.tooltip: Element ID of new song text field on song request page.

ElementIdOfAddSongButton.label: Element ID Of Add Song Button
ElementIdOfAddSongButton.tooltip: Element ID of add song button on song request page.

ClassNameOfNotificationIcon.label: Class Name Of Notification Item
ClassNameOfNotificationIcon.tooltip: Class name of notification item on song request page to parse and process result.

ClassNameOfSuccessNotificationIcon.label: Class Name Of Successful Notification Item
ClassNameOfSuccessNotificationIcon.tooltip: Class name of successful notification item on song request page to parse and process result.

ClassNameOfErrorNotificationIcon.label: Class Name Of Error Notification Item
ClassNameOfErrorNotificationIcon.tooltip: Class name of error notification item on song request page to parse and process result.

ClassNameOfNotificationDescription.label: Class Name Of Notification Description
ClassNameOfNotificationDescription.tooltip: Class name of notification description on song request page to parse and process result.

PermissionOnAddCancelSongRequest.label: Permission
PermissionOnAddCancelSongRequest.tooltip: Who is able to use the add and cancel song request commands.

PermissionInfoOnAddCancelSongRequest.label: Info
PermissionInfoOnAddCancelSongRequest.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission on Add or Cancel Song Request Commands.

PermissionOnApproveRejectGetSongRequest.label: Permission
PermissionOnApproveRejectGetSongRequest.tooltip: Who is able to use the approve, deny or get song request commands.

PermissionInfoOnApproveRejectGetSongRequ.label: Info
PermissionInfoOnApproveRejectGetSongRequ.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission on Approve, Reject or Get Song Request Commands.

PermissionDeniedMessage.value: Permission denied: You have to be a {0} to use {1} command!
PermissionDeniedMessage.label: Permission Denied Message
PermissionDeniedMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on failed permission check. 0 — required permission, 1 — command.

InvalidCommandCallMessage.label: Invalid Command Call Message
InvalidCommandCallMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user calls a command with invalid parameters. 0 — command, 1 — command usage example.

TimeRemainingMessage.value: Command {0} is on cooldown. Time remaining: {1} (seconds).
TimeRemainingMessage.label: Time Remaining Message
TimeRemainingMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to call command which is on cooldown now. 0 — command which is on cooldown, 1 — time remaining.

MaxLimitOfSongRequestsIsExceededMessage.value: Sorry {0}, you have exceeded max allowed limit of song requests per stream ({1}).
MaxLimitOfSongRequestsIsExceededMessage.label: Max Limit Of Song Requests Is Exceeded
MaxLimitOfSongRequestsIsExceededMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user will try to add song requests above limit. 0 — user, 1 — max allowed song requests limit.

InvalidTargetMessage.label: Invalid Target Message
InvalidTargetMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specifies an invalid target. 0 — user, 1 — target.

NoSongRequestsMessage.value: {0}, user {1} doesn't have any active song requests.
NoSongRequestsMessage.label: No Song Requests Message
NoSongRequestsMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specifies a target user without active song requests. 0 — user, 1 — target user.

NonExistentSongRequestNumberMessage.value: {0}, non-existent request number {1} for target user {2}.
NonExistentSongRequestNumberMessage.label: Invalid Song Request Number Message
NonExistentSongRequestNumberMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specifies a song request number which does not exist for target user. 0 — user, 1 — invalid song request number, 2 — target user.

SongRequestAddedMessage.value: {0}, your song request {1} was added and will be processing later.
SongRequestAddedMessage.label: On Song Request Added Message
SongRequestAddedMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request was added. 0 — user name, 1 — song request.

SongRequestToApproveMessage.value: There is a new song request {0} by {1}. Please, approve or reject it.
SongRequestToApproveMessage.label: Song Request To Approve Message
SongRequestToApproveMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request was approved. 0 — song request, 1 — user name who added song request.

SongRequestApprovedMessage.value: {0}, your song request {1} was approved by {2} and will be added to playlist later.
SongRequestApprovedMessage.label: On Song Request Approved Message
SongRequestApprovedMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request was approved. 0 — user name, 1 — song request, 2 — user name who approved song requests.

OnSuccessSongRequestMessage.value: {0}, your song request {1} was added to playlist!{2}
OnSuccessSongRequestMessage.label: On Success Song Request Message
OnSuccessSongRequestMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request was added to playlist. 0 — user name, 1 — song request, 2 — optional description.

OnFailureSongRequestMessage.value: {0}, your song request {1} cannot be added. Error: {2}.
OnFailureSongRequestMessage.label: On Failure Song Request Message
OnFailureSongRequestMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request cannot be added to playlist. 0 — user name, 1 — song request, 2 — error description.

OnFailureSongRequestDefaultErrorMessage.label: On Failure Song Request Default Error Message
OnFailureSongRequestDefaultErrorMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request cannot be added to playlist and no error description is available.

SongRequestRejectedMessage.value: {0}, your song request {1} was rejected by {2}. Reason: {3}.
SongRequestRejectedMessage.label: On Song Request Rejected Message
SongRequestRejectedMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request was rejected. 0 — user name, 1 — song request, 2 — user name who rejected song request, 3 — reject reason.

SongRequestDefaultRejectReason.label: Song Request Default Reject Reason
SongRequestDefaultRejectReason.tooltip: Default reject reason which will be used when calling reject command without reason parameter.

SongRequestCancelMessage.label: On Song Request Cancelled Message
SongRequestCancelMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user's song request was cancelled. 0 — user name, 1 — song request.

AllowLoggingToFile.label: Allow Logging To File
AllowLoggingToFile.tooltip: Allow script to log to file in script folder.

EnableWebDriverDebug.label: Enable Web Driver Debug
EnableWebDriverDebug.tooltip: Enable debug mode for web driver.
